synopsis: Feedback on this shampoo is mixed. Many reviewers report smoother, shinier hair and a mild scent, with some noting reduced hair fall and clean scalps. Several mention the low-lather formula needing more product, especially after oiling, and occasional stickiness if not rinsed well. A noticeable subset experienced dryness, frizz, or increased hair fall, and some cited leaks or faulty pumps on delivery.
key_takeaways: Leaves hair feeling smoother and shinier for many regular users.
Low-lather formula; may need extra product, particularly after oiling.
Mild, pleasant fragrance frequently mentioned across positive reviews.
Hair fall outcomes are mixed, ranging from reduction to noticeable increase.
